summary:
Ever get tired of chickens blocking your way like Gandalf standing before the Balrog, while you run in place rather than stepping over them?

This mod makes chickens get out of the way instead.
descriptionHtml:
Ever get tired of chickens blocking your way like Gandalf standing before the Balrog, while you run in place rather than stepping over them?

This mod makes chickens get out of the way instead, or be trampled if they don't move fast enough.


This is still a work in progress, so please post feedback on any issues you experience or suggestions for improvement.

[b]Known Issues:[/b]
[list][*]If you're standing still when a chicken runs past it may fall over, even though it didn't quite touch you.[*]Birds of Skyrim not yet supported. BoS birds will not move, and vanilla chickens will flee from BoS birds.[/list]
author: wiseman303
